title: Spore Galactic Adventures (working)
description:
Spore Galactic Adventures adds variety and depth to the original space game in Spore, allowing players to beam down to planets, play mission-based adventures and even create their own customized adventures for the first time. Each adventure has a unique reward to upgrade a space creature with special accessories - from an Energy Blade and Stunning Charm to a Jump Jet and more. Players can fight their way to victory as a Warrior, dance with new friends as a Bard, and much more. With an almost unlimited number of user created adventures, thereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s more to play than ever before. The "adventure creator" in Spore Galactic Adventures gives gamers the tools to make their own missions and share them with friends.

How to Play:

1.Install PowerISO
2.Mount Spore Galactic Adventures with PowerISO (you have to use PowerISO!)
3.Instal SGA with this key:
GALU-T27U-Q67K-NTSZ-MEF2
(Credits for key to jwillis2003)
4.Leave the ISO mounted
5.Play!
